Command.CommandText: SELECT M.SysNo, CashPay, PayPrice, ShipPrice, PremiumAmt, DiscountAmt, GiftCardPay, pt.IsPayWhenRecv, pt.SysNo as PayType, ship.SOType, ship.StockType, ship.InvoiceType FROM IPP3.dbo.SO_Master M with(nolock) INNER JOIN IPP3.dbo.PayType pt with(nolock) ON m.PayTypeSysNo=pt.SysNo LEFT JOIN OverseaOrderManagement.dbo.V_OM_SO_CheckShipping ship WITH(NOLOCK) ON m.SysNo = ship.SOSysNo WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT TOP 1 sysno FROM OverseaInvoiceReceiptManagement.dbo.AR_SO_Invoice_MonitorLog L with(nolock) WHERE L.SoSysNo = M.SysNo ) AND [Status] = 4 AND ship.SOType<>9 AND M.Companycode = @Companycode AND OrderDate > @OrderDate AND ship.InvoiceType = 'NEG'
SELECT isnull(SUM(incomeamt),0)+isnull(SUM(PrepayAmt),0) FROM IPP3.dbo.Finance_SOIncome with(nolock) WHERE OrderSysNo=@OrderSysNo AND [Status]>-1 GROUP BY OrderSysNo
SELECT SUM(invoiceamt) FROM OverseaOrderManagement.dbo.Sub_SO_Master with(nolock) WHERE SOSysNo=@SONumber GROUP BY SOSysNo
SELECT isnull(sum(Price),0) AS Price FROM OverseaOrderManagement.dbo.Sub_SO_Item item WITH(nolock) WHERE SOSysNo = @SOSysNo AND ProductSysNo IN (@ProductSysNo)
